content:
Generate the bibliography of the given article in APA format.
Article title: "The Impact of Social Media on Mental Health"
Author: John Smith
Publication date: Dec. 5, 2020

Here is the bibliography in APA format for the given article:

Smith, J. (2020, December 5). *The impact of social media on mental health*. [Publication/Source Name if available]. 

Note: If the article is from a specific publication or website, you would replace "[Publication/Source Name if available]" with the actual name of the source. If it is an online source, you would also include the URL at the end.
